title: Logo - love the ampersand -
content:
Can you tell me what font or fonts are used? Saw on a van & grabbed a picture.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [image.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150120001807/http:/typophile.com/files/image_216.jpg) | 57 KB |
author: nanca5

comments.content:
The script is Filmotype Honey (but I’m not seeing that ampersand in its glyph set):  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/filmotype/honey/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150120001807/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/filmotype/honey/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/filmotype/honey/")

|CATERING| and |FLORAL| appear to be Futura:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/futura/book/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150120001807/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/futura/book/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/futura/book/")
Poetica has an alternate ampersand that is similar, but not a match. Perhaps someone else can ID it....
Nancy, you are quite right—the ampersand is Bickham Script Pro. My visual search didn’t ID it because it has been rotated counterclockwise in the sample.
